Q_DESC:
You are given an array A1,A2...AN. You have to tell how many pairs (i, j) exist such that 1=  i  j = N and Ai XOR Aj is odd.

Input and Output 

First line T, the number of test cases. Each test case: first line N, followed by N integers in next line. For each test case, print the required answer in one line.

Constraints 
1= T = 10 
1 = N = 10^5 
0 = Ai = 10^9
